name: Hodopur® ER 00-1
description: Hodopur® ER 00-1 is the two-component polyurethane high-gloss enamel is intended for applications with high demands on the quality of the surface treatment. It is applied to basic anti-corrosion paints (Hodopur, Hodepox) or suitable fillers and sealants (PES, PUR) and forms the final coating. It can be applied to galvanized surfaces as a single-layer enamel (decorative layer). It is produced in a wide range of shades (RAL or according to an agreed color template). The coating system as a whole is designed for heavy and normal corrosive environments. The created coating film is mechanically resistant (abrasion resistant), chemically stable and UV stable. Hodopur enamel coating systems ensure long-term protection of the substrate against weather conditions.
